Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1978...
Traded from Minnesota to Boston (FBA) on 4/28/1978 (Going to Min: P N. Saez. Going to SHP: P F. Vosburg, RF J. Riddle)...
Injured on 7/23/1979 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 5/6/1980 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/14/1986, off Michael Feist (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1986, off Arthur Franke (Min)...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Ashburn on 2/5/1987 (Going to Ash: RF J. Riddle. Going to SHP: CF B. Wyatt)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Plum Grove, driving in 7 runs on 10/1/1990...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1990...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 4/14/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
